channel.title: Empirescape help compiler help plz!
channel.description:
So i just downloaded empirescape v2 and wanted to try. The client compiler wont work tho. I need to compile to my ip so i can play. I even tried usin a diff client to make sure it works but its laggy so i need this 1 working.
This is what compiler looks like : @echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\Bin\javac.exe" -cp . *java pause
yes that is my java version but it says it cant find the path specified
help me out

item.title: Empirescape help compiler help plz!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“sexy slay, post:6, topic:300351”]I do not know if this will be any help to you, but i still use good old jdk 6 update 13, (dont know why, just never really changed) anyways, my compiler code is this

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

Which clearly doesnt show my update, if i was you, i would bring up two screens, of edit, your compiler. Then try my code and see if anything persists. If new problems occur then save your old compiler, and keep looking for an answer. I am sorry if i just wasted 3mins of my time, and probably like 30 secs of your time. But I hope i may of helped your problem.

  • Sexy Slay[/quote]

im pretty sure that worked thanks.

Read full topic

But I hope i may of helped your problem.

So i just downloaded empirescape v2 and wanted to try. The client compiler wont work tho. I need to compile to my ip so i can play. I even tried usin a diff client to make sure it works but its laggy so i need this 1 working.
